spiritsExplanation: This workout is classified as primarily 'Soothing & Restorative' with a score of 0.9 due to its focus on cooling down and gradually reducing heart rate, which is indicated by terms like 'Low Pressure Cool-Down' and 'cool down' in the title and description.
